doc.text: Generic context. Registers <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="SLAB">slabs</ref> and <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="STAIRS">stairs</ref>.

Decoration context for wooden planks. Registers <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="SLAB">slabs</ref>,  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="STAIRS">stairs</ref>, <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="FENCE">fences</ref>,  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="FENCE_GATE">fence gates</ref>, <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="WOOD_BUTTON">buttons</ref>,  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="WOOD_PRESSURE_PLATE">pressure plates</ref>, <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="DOOR">doors</ref>,  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="TRAPDOOR">trapdoors</ref> and <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="SIGN">signs</ref>.

Decoration context for stone blocks. Registers <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="SLAB">slabs</ref>,  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="STAIRS">stairs</ref>, <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="WALL">walls</ref>,  <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="STONE_BUTTON">buttons</ref> and <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="STONE_PRESSURE_PLATE">pressure plates</ref>.

parameters.name: types
parameters.doc: The types to register. This must include <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType" field="BASE">DecorationType#BASE</ref>.

doc.summary: Gets whether this context has a given <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType">DecorationType</ref>
doc.text: Gets whether this context has a given <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType">DecorationType</ref>

doc.summary: A context that defines, what <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType">elements</ref> should be registered with a <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecoratedBlock">DecoratedBlock</ref>.
doc.text: A context that defines, what <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecorationType">elements</ref> should be registered with a <ref cls="org/moddingx/libx/base/decoration/DecoratedBlock">DecoratedBlock</ref>.
